projects.title: RGC v2.0: Radha Gobinda Chandra - A Radio Galaxy Classifier Package
projects.description: Developing open-source Python package for automated morphological classification of radio AGN. Processing ~20,000 radio galaxy images from LOFAR/LoTSS and VLA/FIRST surveys with semi-supervised CNN architecture.

projects.title: PIE-ADA: Astronomical Transient Classification
projects.description: Physics-Informed Ensemble with Adaptive Data Augmentation for 14-class photometric transient classification. Achieved 80.36% accuracy with 24-33% improvement over baselines using PLAsTiCC dataset.

projects.title: LunaXNet: Lunar Mineralogy Mapping
projects.description: Hybrid CNN-Transformer framework for mineralogical segmentation from Chandrayaan-1 M3 hyperspectral data. Targeting 92%+ pixel-wise accuracy for olivine, pyroxene, and plagioclase identification.

projects.title: Vision-Language Models for Galaxy Characterization
projects.description: Multimodal AI system for automated galaxy characterization across optical, infrared, radio, and X-ray wavelengths using CLIP/BLIP architectures.

projects.title: GAN-Enhanced Medical Image Classification
projects.description: StyleGAN2-ADA for gastrointestinal disease classification with dual-stage preprocessing and Grad-CAM interpretability. Achieved 96.2% accuracy on Kvasir dataset.

projects.title: Car Counter: Real-Time Vehicle Monitoring
projects.description: IoT system for real-time vehicle detection using Raspberry Pi and OpenCV. Achieved 90%+ counting accuracy with web dashboard visualization.

projects.title: knackbook: Social Media Platform
projects.description: Full-stack social networking platform for creative talent sharing with PHP backend, MySQL database, and real-time messaging features.

projects.title: Goal Sensing Machine
projects.description: Arduino-based automated football goal detection system using IR sensors with 95%+ detection accuracy and LCD score display.
